name: Clean Dark Grey
description:
A color scheme of grey. A dark grey back ground with light grey text for late night viewing.
Meant for reading but can be applied to most websites.
additional_info:
In the editing mode add any URL, for the most part it should work for any website.
Comment any site you want add
I am also a super beginner at HTML so if you know of the correct way to edit it let me know
Enjoy.
